headline: JUDGE REJECTS BAN ON 'BIRTH CONTROL'; Clears Two Doctors and Nurse in Test Case Brought Under Connecticut Statute LAW'S DEFECTS STRESSED Unconstitutionality Ascribed to Measure's Failure to Give Exceptions for Physician
snippet: WATERBURY, Conn., Aug. 7 (AP).--Connecticut's "birth control" law was ruled unconstitutional today by Superior Court Judge Kenneth Wynne.

headline: BIRTH CONTROL RIFT ENDED BY MERGER; Rival Factions Join and Map Plans to Widen Health and Welfare Program MRS. SANGER AN OFFICER Dr. R.N. Pierson Selected as President of Federation-- Both Acclaim Organization
snippet: A rift in the ranks of the birth control movement in this country that occurred ten years ago was ended yesterday by a merger of the two factions and the adoption of a concerted program to establish birth control as an important part of the public...
